sentence.Network_en: Electrification of the countryside -- yes, that, too, is impressive.
sentence.Network_cn: 是的.农村 电气化 也是了不起的事.

sentence.Network_en: After electrification, it will readily stick to a wall or a ceiling.
sentence.Network_cn: 起电后, 它立即吸附到墙壁上或天花板上.

sentence.Network_en: All hype aside, electrification certainly proved to be a good idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了所有的大肆宣传, 电气化的好处无疑已经得到了证明.

entry.def: The electrification of a house, town, or area is the connecting of that place with a supply of electricity.

means.word_mean: 1. the activity of thrilling or markedly exciting some person or group
